arabic_text: وَٱصۡبِرۡ وَمَا صَبۡرُكَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِۚ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُ فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ
translation: And be patient, for your patience comes only from Allah; do not grieve over them[82], nor be distressed by their evil plots.
footnotes: [82] The Prophet (ﷺ) was grieved that they would not believe.
